<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Stargazer's Spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2413)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornate [spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54) has a brass tube inscribed with constellations and green-tinted lens. It's often used by field astronomers to pick out greater details among stars and other celestial bodies. Like a typical spyglass, you can see eight times farther while looking through a _stargazer's spyglass_.

<document level="2" id="action-1990" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
